Name: MPI_MODE_WRONLY
Description:
MPI_MODE_WRONLY is a flag that can be passed to MPI_File_open to ask for write-only access to the file. It cannot be used in conjunction with MPI_MODE_RDONLY or MPI_MODE_RDWR.
Other flags are MPI_MODE_RDONLY, MPI_MODE_RDWR, MPI_MODE_CREATE, MPI_MODE_EXCL, MPI_MODE_DELETE_ON_CLOSE, MPI_MODE_UNIQUE_OPEN, MPI_MODE_SEQUENTIAL and MPI_MODE_APPEND.
